serendipity: The occurrence of events by chance in a happy or beneficial way
ephemeral: Lasting for a very short time; transient or fleeting
melancholy: A feeling of pensive sadness, typically with no obvious cause
resilience: The capacity to recover quickly from difficulties; mental toughness
wanderlust: A strong desire or impulse to travel and explore the world
eloquence: Fluent or persuasive speaking or writing, especially with skillful use of language
perspective: A particular attitude toward or way of regarding something
